column4: thunderbird wont actually get my gmail messages - there are new messages (ive checked w/ opera), but thunderbird wont download them
ive set that all up: it used to work a few weeks ago, and it works with opera mail, just not with thunderbird
its 995 for pop make sure ssl is enabled and 587 for smtp make sure tls is enabled
the servers are pop.gmail.com and smtp.gmail.com
